info.name: Prbal Services API - Categories & SubCategories
info.description: Complete collection for Service Categories and SubCategories endpoints. Based on actual codebase analysis from views.py, models.py, and serializers.py. Standardized response format: {message, data, time, statusCode}

variable.description: Base URL for the services API
JWT authentication token for admin operations

item.name: üóÇÔ∏è Service Categories
item.description: ServiceCategoryViewSet endpoints - CRUD operations with admin permissions for write operations. Based on views.py analysis.

request.description: List service categories. Permission: IsAuthenticatedOrReadOnly. No auth required for read.

response.name: Success Response - Non-Paginated
